page.title: 03WESTOVER FARM,WATERMEADOWS
page.content: WESTOVER FARM IS OWNED BY LIDDELL ENTERPRISES.IT IS AN{ARABLE FARM COVERING 1250 ACRES.IT HAS ONE MAIN FARMHOUSE,9 COTTAGES FOR EMPLOYEES.THE FARM EMPLOYS 10 PEOPLE ALL LIVING AT THE FARM.THE MAIN CROP IS{SUGAR {BEET,WHICH IS GROWN FOR SEED.THE FARM SELLS THE SEED;DOES NOT USE THE SEED ITSELF. SECONDARY CROPS ARE WHEAT,BARLEY,OIL SEED RAPE.THE FARM OWNS NO LIVESTOCK BUT RENTS THE WATER-MEADOWS FOR GRAZING CATTLE.HEDGING BETWEEN THE FIELDS USED FOR PHEASANT SHOOTING. THERE IS A FOOTPATH BY THE OLD CANAL WHICH IS APPROACHED ACROSS THE WATERMEADOWS.THE CANAL IS USED FOR PRIVATE FISHING.THE LAND AROUND THE CANAL FOOTPATH IS MAINLY WOODED WITH AN ABUNDANCE OF WILD FLOWERS,INSECTS AND SMALL MAMMALS. {
